summary: SummaryCeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser is a gel-based face wash for balanced to oily skin that cleanses and refreshes skin and retains moisture while reinforcing the skin's barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle gel-based foaming face wash formula effectively dissolves dirt, excess oil & makeup such as foundation & eyelinerHelps restore the skin's protective barrier with ceramidesFace cleanser formula helps attract moisture to the skin with hyaluronic acidProvides soothing benefits with niacinamideSuitable for the face, body and handsIdeal for normal / balanced to oily skinNon-drying and non-irritatingNon-comedogenicDeveloped with dermatologistsKey IngredientsCeramides: Essential for healthy skin, Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrierHyaluronic acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skinâ€™s surface and helps the skin retain moistureNiacinamide: Helps calm skinFormulated WithoutFragranceItem 2254420How To UseStep 1.) Wet skin with lukewarm water. â€‹Step 2.) Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circular motion. â€‹Step 3.) Rinse. â€‹Build your Everyday Routine with CeraVe **:**â€‹Cleanse: â€‹Foaming Facial Cleanser: Cleanses and removes makeup & oil without disrupting the protective skin barrier. Gentle foaming action refreshes and cleanses skin, including removing excess oils. â€‹**Moisturize:**â€‹Daily Moisturizing Lotion: Moisturizes and helps restore the protective skin barrierâ€‹**Treat:**â€‹++Skin Renewing Vitamin C Serum++ : 10% pure Vitamin C to help visibly brighten and even skin tone while providing antioxidant benefits â€‹**Protect:**â€‹Ulta Light Moisturizing Lotion: Moisturizes with a matte finish & helps repair the protective skin barrierAlso comes in a travel friendly, under TSA liquid limit: Travel Size Foaming Facial CleanserIngredientsPurified Water, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate and Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceramide 3, Ceramide 6-II, Ceramide 1, Hyaluronic Acid, Cholesterol, Polyoxyl 40 Stearate, Glyceryl Monostearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Phosphate, Dipotassium Phosphate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cetyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Phytosphingosine, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum.
how_to_use: Step 1.) Wet skin with lukewarm water. â€‹Step 2.) Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circular motion. â€‹Step 3.) Rinse. â€‹Build your Everyday Routine with CeraVe **:**â€‹Cleanse: â€‹Foaming Facial Cleanser: Cleanses and removes makeup & oil without disrupting the protective skin barrier. Gentle foaming action refreshes and cleanses skin, including removing excess oils. â€‹**Moisturize:**â€‹Daily Moisturizing Lotion: Moisturizes and helps restore the protective skin barrierâ€‹**Treat:**â€‹++Skin Renewing Vitamin C Serum++ : 10% pure Vitamin C to help visibly brighten and even skin tone while providing antioxidant benefits â€‹**Protect:**â€‹Ulta Light Moisturizing Lotion: Moisturizes with a matte finish & helps repair the protective skin barrierAlso comes in a travel friendly, under TSA liquid limit: Travel Size Foaming Facial Cleanser

reviews.headline: Doesn't get my face clean
reviews.comments: This cleanser is, in a word, fine. It doesn't strip the oils from my face, which is nice, but it doesn't feel like it truly cleanses my skin. I can't be sure, but I feel that this product is what is causing me to break out all over (and my skin is not acne-prone). I have tried CeraVe's other hydrating cleansers, and I think the foaming quality of those products cleanses better. I'll skip this one next time in favor of their other cleaners.

reviews.headline: Been using for years
reviews.comments: I've been using Cerave for many years, and it was recommended by my dermatologist. I like the way it cleans, but does not leave my face dry.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I'm not a fan. It leaves an oily residue no matter how much I rinse my faceâ€¦ due to the very thick, gel, consistency.

reviews.headline: Cerave it's the best
reviews.comments: Cerave it's the best. Excellent product and great price

reviews.headline: Favorite CeraVe Product!
reviews.comments: I've tried lots of CeraVe's products and I have to say this was my favorite. I use it in the shower every day and it never fails to cleanse my face perfectly. I would DEFINITELY recommend.

reviews.headline: Chock full of parabens
reviews.comments: If you like endocrine disruptors, you'll love this stuff. Plenty of parabens to mess up your hormone levels. This stuff is illegal in other countries, and Ulta should not sell it. Guess I have to read every single label. Wildly disappointed.

reviews.headline: Overrated
reviews.comments: Unfortunately i was not not impressed. I do have combination skin type. I usually like CeraVe moisturizer but this cleanser didnt clean. Caused little tiny white heads every so often and jist didn't leave me squeaky clean. I also didn't like the texture so I think this cleanser maybe best for dry skin.

reviews.headline: Beware!! This stuff is harsh!
reviews.comments: I started using this several months ago because of the good reviews and I wanted a gentle cleanser. I did notice a burning feeling if I left it on too long, but ignored it. A short time later I was having really bad perioral dermatitis and tried everything I could think of to stop it (but still using this "gentle" cleanser). It wasnt until my daughter started using this cleanser and began getting dermatitis as well that I finally figured out it was this cleanser causing all our problems. After stopping it, we are both seeing major improvement. Beware, this stuff is harsh and not for everyone!!

reviews.headline: Terrible for sensitive, rosacea prone skin
reviews.comments: I tried this face wash for the first time and it completely broke out my face in acne and flared up my rosacea. My face was still red and irritated the following morning. When I washed my face with my regular face wash, it calmed down. I would not recommend this for anybody with sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Gentle cleanser
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and this is cleansing while being gentle. 4 stars because you have to get makeup off with something else prior to using this - and I don't even wear alot of makeup.

reviews.headline: Excellent Cleansing
reviews.comments: I really rely on this cleanser to do the job without stripping my skin. I have dry skin and must be careful in choosing which cleansers to us so I don't make the dryness worse. This cleanser is gentle while doing a great job.

reviews.headline: Love Love Love Cerave products
reviews.comments: It is really great to have Cerave products in travel sizes. Thanks!

reviews.headline: does as it says!
reviews.comments: i have oily skin and i bought this to use in the morning when i don't want to strip my skin of it's oils completely.  it feels almost like a cream/oil texture that's a little difficult to wash off at first, you need to really scrub to get it all off.

reviews.headline: Grateful for refill option!
reviews.comments: Love this Cerave so much that I use it as a body wash for my desert dry skin.  And now that they have the refill pouches I can decant it into a nice aluminum bottle for the shower and avoid single-use plastic!

reviews.headline: Would by again
reviews.comments: Not greasy. Love it!

reviews.headline: Combination skin holy grail!
reviews.comments: I have combination acne prone skin with hyperpigmentation. I've tried so many cleansers and most of them break me out or don't clean my skin very well. I use this and follow up with a very hydrating moisturizer and my skin has never been better.

reviews.headline: Combination skin holy grail!
reviews.comments: I have combination acne prone skin with hyperpigmentation. I've tried so many cleansers and most of them break me out or don't clean my skin very well. I use this and follow up with a very hydrating moisturizer and my skin has never been better.

reviews.headline: Worked well
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Worked well for my skin type! Had a pleasant scent but not overwhelming, texture was smooth, and packaging was light and pretty. I would recommend based on ingredients as well.

reviews.headline: Soft gentle cleanser
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I enjoyed using this face wash as it cleaned my face without stripping the natural oils. It left my skin smooth and not overly drying or cause breakouts.

reviews.headline: Love it for my oily, sensitive skin!
reviews.comments:
First of all, I love the foaming, cushiony textureâ€”it lathers up on its own without needing much effort, which is super convenient. Since using this face wash daily, my skin feels less oily, and it doesn't strip away moisture at all. It's gentle yet effective, and I've noticed fewer breakouts, which is a big win for my acne-prone, sensitive skin.

The only downside for me is the smell. Even though it says "no added fragrance," it kind of smells like buttered popcorn to meâ€”not bad, just unexpected. I'm someone who prefers completely fragrance-free products, but I've gotten used to it and it doesn't bother me as much anymore.

Overall, I highly recommend this for anyone with oily and sensitive skin. It's a great everyday cleanser!

media.headline: for my teenage son and his teenage skin
Effective
media.caption: A month later using Cera ve Hydrating Cleanser.

faceoff_positive.comments: This is the best hydrating cleanser I have found for the price! It doesn't contain any fragrance, which is terrible for your skin and doesn't leave your skin feeling tight. I love that it has hyaluronic acid. I have dry skin and dry patches. I use this cleanser and the CeraVe moisturizer in the tub. I use it in the morning for extra hydration, then I switch to another cleanser at night. The people who are giving this a low rating don't understand what it is for. THIS IS NOT A MAKEUP REMOVER. There are no claims that it will remove makeup. If you wear makeup, you should be taking your makeup off with some type of makeup removal product FIRST. Then go in with this cleanser.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Hydrating Cleanser I Have fFound!

faceoff_negative.comments: Usually I am a big fan of Cerave products.  Their face lotion and SA lotion for rough and bumpy skin has worked wonders for me and my children with mildly  sensitive skin. However this face wash completely burned my skin and left me with red incredibly itchy and painful skin on my face after one full day of use (2 washes). I would not recommend this product to anyone with any type of sensitivity. I figured the "fragrance free, paraben-free, gentle on skin and non drying" description would work for me but apparently I was wrong. Disappointed is an understand.
faceoff_negative.headline: This product left my face dry itchy and irritated.
